title: Introduction
description: Welcome to DevDocs Pro. Get up and running in under 3 minutes.
content: DevDocs Pro is a documentation-as-code platform that auto-generates beautiful, searchable API docs from your OpenAPI spec.

title: Quickstart
description: Ship your first docs in 3 minutes.
content: From zero to a fully interactive, searchable API portal in under 3 minutes.

title: Authentication
description: Bearer tokens, API keys, and OAuth flows.
content: All API requests require a Bearer token passed in the Authorization header.

title: API Overview
description: Full REST API reference with examples.
content: DevDocs Pro exposes a clean REST API at api.devdocs.pro/v3.

title: TypeScript SDK
description: Fully typed TypeScript SDK with zero config.
content: The TypeScript SDK provides fully typed access to all DevDocs Pro API endpoints.

title: Deployment
description: Deploy to Vercel, Netlify, or self-hosted.
content: Deploy your docs to any platform with a single command.
